Comments_List: I learned a lot about the different aspects of developing and running psych studies. I gained more skill in analyzing a research question and figuring out the best ways to design a successful study to answer a question. I also gained skills in analyzing data as well as recruiting participants and writing an empirical report.
I learned how to think critically about research motivations and research protocol, and how to develop my ideas
I think it went very well and facilitated my learning!
quite a bit of office work but a good experience

Definitely do it as a great way to get lab experience.
